Detailed Description

This class is a mapping of a resource directory containing chunks into a chunk space.

Note:
Only its chunk space and chunks queued to load retain references to this object.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

const Matrix &  m,

The path supplied should _not_ end with a slash.

Member Function Documentation

void GeometryMapping::boundsToGrid ( const BoundingBox &  bb,
int &  minGridX,
int &  minGridZ,
int &  maxGridX,
int &  maxGridZ 
) const

This method calculates the grid bounds of the given bounding box.

The returned grid bounds are in the same space as the bounding box, ie. doesn't differentiate between local or world coordinates.

void GeometryMapping::gridToBounds ( int  minGridX,
int  minGridY,
int  maxGridX,
int  maxGridY,
BoundingBox &  retBB 
) const

This method calculates a bounding box, based on the given grid bounds.

The returned bounding box is in the same space as the grid coords, ie. doesn't differentiate between local or world coordinates.

void GeometryMapping::gridToLocal ( int  x,
int  y,
int &  lx,
int &  ly 
) const

Utility coordinate space mapping functions.

It reports the results via pass-by-reference values.

Parameters:
x world x grid coordinate.
y world y grid coordinate.
lx [out] local x grid coordinate.
ly [out] local y grid coordinate.

const int  gridZ 
) const

This method checks whether the given grid coordinates are within our local grid bounds.

Parameters:
gridX local X grid coordinate to check
gridZ local Z grid coordinate to check
Returns:
bool true iff we contain both gridX and gridZ

int GeometryMapping::maxLGridY (  )  const [inline]

int GeometryMapping::minGridX (  )  const [inline]

The following accessors return the world-space grid bounds of this mapping, after the transform is applied.

These bounds are expanded to include even the slightest intersection of the mapping with a grid square in the space's coordinate system

int GeometryMapping::minGridY (  )  const [inline]

int GeometryMapping::minLGridX (  )  const [inline]

The following accessors return the bounds of this mapping in its own local coordinate system.

DataSectionPtr GeometryMapping::openSettings ( const std::string &  path  )  [static]

This method opens the settings file associated with the input path to space geometry.

std::string GeometryMapping::outsideChunkIdentifier ( int  x,
int  z,
bool  checkBounds = true 
) const

This method returns the identifier for the outside chunk in which the given point would lie.

If the checkBounds parameter is true, and the point does not lie within the bounds of the mapping, then the empty string is returned instead.

std::string GeometryMapping::outsideChunkIdentifier ( const Vector3 &  localPoint,
bool  checkBounds = true 
) const

This method returns the identifier for the outside chunk in which the given point would lie.

If the checkBounds parameter is true, and the point does not lie within the bounds of the mapping, then the empty string is returned instead.

const std::string& GeometryMapping::path (  )  const [inline]

DataSectionPtr GeometryMapping::pDirSection (  ) 

pDirSection accessor.

Should only be called from loading thread as it may block, especially if chunk data is out of date.
